name: My Anime Database
desc: Simple My Anime List Clone is a basic web app that lets you track and manage your anime, kind of like a simpler version of MyAnimeList

name: Movie RecSys
desc: A movie recommendation system designed to suggest movies that align with the user's preferences based on previously liked movies.

name: Items Inventory
desc: A simple and easy-to-use website that helps users keep track of their items or inventory. Designed to make managing goods more organized and less of a hassle.

name: Book RevU
desc: Book RevU is a mobile app where book lovers can discover new titles and read or write reviews. This project was developed to fulfill the requirements of the Platform-Based Application course.

name: Management System
desc: Website management system to efficiently manage report of citizens in Kebumen City. Improving efficiency and management report until 60%

name: Tokek
desc: A reporting system that automates problem categorization and increases efficiency by up to 30% using indoBERT, the ReactJS framework, and Python.
